name: Bomb Survival
description:
An evil robot spews bombs at up to 4 players, while you (hopefully) manage to survive until the end! Play singleplayer, versus or co-op on keyboard, controllers or both.

This game was made in roughly 3 weeks as part of a school trip to Seattle, USA. Special thanks to Edmonds Community College for the opportunity!

Controller inputs will require external software, such as JoyToKey.
